name: Redemption Hair Repair Bonding Cremé Refill

breadcrumbs.name: Redemption Hair Repair Bonding Cremé Refill

images: https://beautysociety.blob.core.windows.net/images-prod/61603 Beauty Society Advisor Product Guide - Redemption Creme.jpg
description:
Refills are meant to refill the beautiful bottles of products you already love! With that being said, all refills are non-refundable

Our exclusive repair mask contains active ingredients such as Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3 and Panthenol (Vitamin b5) that strengthen hair follicles and encourage the thickening of the hair. Other active ingredients such as Cupuacu butter and Biotin works to smooth split ends and soften all hair types. So go ahead and experience the difference for yourself!

How to Use: Shampoo your hair, then rinse. Apply the Redemption hair mask and wait for 3-5 minutes before rinsing well. Follow with conditioner. Towel dry and style your refreshed hair as you usually would. Incorporate this mask in your shower routine once a week or as often as needed.

Ingredients: Aqua, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Glycerin, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Cyclopentasiloxane, Peg-12 Dimethicone, Cetrimonium Chloride, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Chamomile Extract, Amodimethicone, Glyceryl Monostearate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Hydrogenated Olive Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil Unsaponifiables, Calophyllum Tacamahaca (Tamanu) Seed Oil, Gardenia Tahitensis (Monoi) Flower Extract, Citric Acid, Orbignya Oleifera (Babassu) Seed Oil, Theobroma Grandiflorum (Cupuacu) Seed Butter, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Polyquaternium-37, Butylene Glycol, Panthenol, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3, Biotin, Squalane, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Ethylhexylglycerin.

PURIFIED WATER, SODIUM C14-16 OLEFIN SULFONATE, DECYL GLUCOSIDE, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, ACRYLATES COPOLYMER, GLYCOL STEARATE, HYDROLYZED KERATIN, BIOTIN, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER EXTRACT, ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT, ALTHEA OFFICINALIS ROOT EXTRACT, CITRUS GRANDIS (GRAPEFRUIT) FRUIT EXTRACT, HUMULUS (HOPS) EXTRACT, CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS (ORANGE) PEEL EXTRACT, EQUISETUM ARVERSE EXTRACT, CENTELLA ASIATICA EXTRACT, YUCCA SCHIDIGERA EXTRACT, FRAGRANCE, POLYQUATERNIUM-10, CYMBOPOGON SCHOENANTHUS EXTRACT, CITRUS MEDICA LIMONUM (LEMON) PEEL EXTRACT, METHYLCHLOROISOTHIAZOLINONE, SALIVIA SCLAREA (CLARY) EXTRACT, METHYLISOTHIAZOLINONE, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, VACCINIUM MYRTILLUS FRUIT/LEAF EXTRACT, DISODIUM EDTA, SODIUM HYDROXIDE.

name: Ritual Lipid Repair Body Lotion Refill

breadcrumbs.name: Ritual Lipid Repair Body Lotion Refill

description: Ritual body cream is an all-over moisturizer packed with hydrating and anti-aging compounds to leave skin smooth and supple. Designed for use from the shoulders down, this formula contains the same potent mix of anti-aging and ultra-hydrating ingredients found in Ritual and Liquid Luxury hand creams. Skin-soothing ingredients such as squalane and lavender oil calm irritation and support a healthy, natural glow. Ceramides, phospholipids, and plant oils hydrate skin deeply for a plumped, youthful appearance.
descriptionHtml: Ritual body cream is an all-over moisturizer packed with hydrating and anti-aging compounds to leave skin smooth and supple. Ceramides, phospholipids, and plant oils hydrate skin deeply for a plumped, youthful appearance.

name: Smooth Operator Refill
images: https://beautysociety.blob.core.windows.net/images-prod/61603 Beauty Society Advisor Product Guide - Smooth Operator.jpg
description:
Refills are meant to refill the beautiful bottles of products you already love! With that being said, all refills are non-refundable

Cellulite Cream

Make cellulite a thing of the past. We know how stubborn cellulite can be and how difficult it is to find a solution that actually works. That is why we have formulated this amazing cream with strong and effective ingredients such as Caffeine, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Brassica Alba Sprout Extract, Theophylline, and Theobromine. Apply cream regularly to thighs, hips, tummy, and derriere to give those areas an added lift and healthy glow!
descriptionHtml:
Refills are meant to refill the beautiful bottles of products you already love! With that being said, all refills are non-refundable


Cellulite Cream

Make cellulite a thing of the past. We know how stubborn cellulite can be and how difficult it is to find a solution that actually works. That is why we have formulated this amazing cream with strong and effective ingredients such as Caffeine, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Brassica Alba Sprout Extract, Theophylline, and Theobromine. Apply cream regularly to thighs, hips, tummy, and derriere to give those areas an added lift and healthy glow!

name: Redemption Hair Care Regimen
description:
Save 20% off your ENTIRE CART with the purchase of this Regimen and coupon code STARTER20

Redemption - Hair Repair Bonding Cremé

Our exclusive repair mask contains active ingredients like Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3 and Panthenol (Vitamin B5), which strengthen hair follicles and encourage hair thickening. Additionally, Cupuacu butter and Biotin work together to smooth split ends and soften all hair types.

Redemption - Hair Repair + Conditioning Spray

A multi-tasking leave-in conditioning spray that helps tame frizz, adds moisture to dry and stressed hair, and repairs damage - all while adding thermal protection and leaving your hair feeling silky soft and shiny.

Redemption - Scalp Elixir

Reduce signs of shedding for thicker, fuller-looking hair with vegan biotin and Acetyl Tetrapeptide that strengthens hair follicles and targets hair thinning. Ingredients such as Salicylic Acid gently resurface the scalp to fight dryness, dandruff, and irritation to reveal a healthier-looking scalp.

Redemption - Dry Shampoo

Redemption Dry Shampoo quickly absorbs oils, odor, dirt and sweat leaving your hair looking fresh and smelling amazing! It is also infused with vegan biotin to promote healthy and strong hair. PLUS, aerosol cans are extremely bad for the environment so we went with a more eco-friendly option! Meet the powder pump, no harsh chemicals, just air!

BONUS ITEM: Scalp Revitalizing Massager

Our Scalp Revitalizing Massager features a series of bristles that stimulate the scalp and boost scalp health, providing both an exhilarating scalp massage and a relaxing experience.

name: Happy Feet Enzyme Foot Mask
description:
Happy Feet Enzyme Foot Mask

Say goodbye to dry and cracked and hello to soft and gorgeous! This foot mask contains pineapple and papaya enzymes that gently exfoliate your skin and ingredients such as Shea Butter that moisturize and hydrate your feet. Enjoy silky skin from your head to your toes!

PURIFIED WATER, SODIUM C14-16 OLEFIN SULFONATE, DECYL GLUCOSIDE, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, ACRYLATES COPOLYMER, GLYCOL STEARATE, HYDROLYZED KERATIN, BIOTIN, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER EXTRACT, ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT, ALTHEA OFFICINALIS ROOT EXTRACT, CITRUS GRANDIS (GRAPEFRUIT) FRUIT EXTRACT, HUMULUS (HOPS) EXTRACT, CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS (ORANGE) PEEL EXTRACT, EQUISETUM ARVERSE EXTRACT, CENTELLA ASIATICA EXTRACT, YUCCA SCHIDIGERA EXTRACT, FRAGRANCE, POLYQUATERNIUM-10, CYMBOPOGON SCHOENANTHUS EXTRACT, CITRUS MEDICA LIMONUM (LEMON) PEEL EXTRACT, METHYLCHLOROISOTHIAZOLINONE, SALIVIA SCLAREA (CLARY) EXTRACT, METHYLISOTHIAZOLINONE, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, VACCINIUM MYRTILLUS FRUIT/LEAF EXTRACT, DISODIUM EDTA, SODIUM HYDROXIDE.

name: Redemption - Dry Shampoo
images: https://beautysociety.blob.core.windows.net/images-prod/61603 Beauty Society Advisor Product Guide - Redemption Dry.jpg
description:
Dry Shampoo

This amazing dry shampoo is your new best friend! Redemption Dry Shampoo quickly absorbs oils, odor, dirt and sweat leaving your hair looking fresh and smelling amazing! It is also infused with vegan biotin to promote healthy and strong hair. PLUS, aerosol cans are extremely bad for the environment so we went with a more eco-friendly option! Meet the powder pump, no harsh chemicals, just air!

38g

Ingredients & Directions

Pump a few sprays of dry shampoo onto roots. Use fingers or a brush to rub in into roots and scalp. Use as often as needed.

Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Maranta Arundinacea Root (Arrowroot),Bentonite, Silt (sulphur mud), Biotin, Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender) flower oil, Pelargonium Roseum (rose geranium) leaf oil, Cymbopogon schoenanthus (Lemongrass) Oil, potassium sorbate

Who Should Use Redemption

Anyone wanting to make their dirty/oily hair look refreshed. Perfect for on the go!

name: Nano Mist Sprayer
description:
Nano Mist Sprayer

Using nano atomization technology, water can effectively penetrate deep into the skin and allows the skin to quickly absorb moisture.

Use of mineral water is suggested. Add a few drops of toner to the water for an extra refresh!
descriptionHtml:

the best pumice foot scrubber you will ever use!

name: Golden Child Tanning Drops
description:
Tanning Drops

Take your summer glow to the next level

Get that golden hour glow without the sun damage! The sun produces harmful UVB and UVA rays that can cause dark spots and prematurely age your skin, but now you don't have to choose between damaged skin and a glowing tan. Golden Child is a sunless self-tanner that is fully customizable to how bronzed you want to look. Use the chart included in this box to guide how many drops to use on each section of the body: arms, legs, torso, etc. Mix your desired amount of drops with your moisturizer and wait 5-7 hours for your tan to begin developing! Reapply about once a week to maintain tan or only use when desired. Wash hands thoroughly after use.

Watch the Golden Child Tanning Drops tutorial here!
descriptionHtml:
Tanning Drops

Take your summer glow to the next level

Get that golden hour glow without the sun damage! The sun produces harmful UVB and UVA rays that can cause dark spots and prematurely age your skin, but now you don't have to choose between damaged skin and a glowing tan. Golden Child is a sunless self-tanner that is fully customizable to how bronzed you want to look. Use the chart included in this box to guide how many drops to use on each section of the body: arms, legs, torso, etc. Mix your desired amount of drops with your moisturizer and wait 5-7 hours for your tan to begin developing! Reapply about once a week to maintain tan or only use when desired. Wash hands thoroughly after use.

Watch the Golden Child Tanning Drops tutorial here!

name: Nailed It Cuticle Oil
description:
NAILED IT

Do you want to up your nail game? Nailed It is a high-end cuticle oil that stimulates nail growth,
protects your nails and cuticles against trauma, and improves your nail's overall health and appearance! Our cuticle oil is packed with luxurious ingredients that will have your nails appear stronger and shinier than ever!

How to use: Apply Nailed It to your cuticles on your hands and feet. Use daily for best results.

Ingredients: Vitis vinifera seed oil (grapeseed oil), Simmondsia Chinensis
(Jojoba) Seed Oil, Squalane, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Oenothera
Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Tocopherol, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Ubiquinone, Citrus
Reticulata (Tangerine) Peel Oil, Eugenia caryophyllus (Clove) Flower Oil.

5 ml

name: Hair Towel
description:
Beauty Society Hair Towel

Ditch the old bath towel for your hair. Let be honest, it's heavy, unsightly, and damages your beautiful hair! Our ultra-soft hair towel is designed to be lightweight, super absorbent, and will leave your hair feeling extra soft and frizz-free!

One Size Fits Most

name: Success Perfume
description: Indulge in the sweet smell of Success. Allow yourself to toe the line between playful and sophisticated. Wrap yourself in heart notes of fresh jasmine and an airy top note of natural peach. Experience the sensual realization of prosperity in this floral & peachy perfume that has everyone in its midst flutter with envy and asking the question, "What are you wearing?" As you respond, "Success, of course."
descriptionHtml: Indulge in the sweet smell of Success. Allow yourself to toe the line between playful and sophisticated. Wrap yourself in heart notes of fresh jasmine and an airy top note of natural peach. Experience the sensual realization of prosperity in this floral & peachy perfume that has everyone in its midst flutter with envy and asking the question, "What are you wearing?" As you respond, "Success, of course."

name: Solar Soothe - Post Sun Lotion
description: Experience the rejuvenating touch of Solar Soothe, a meticulously crafted gel lotion that nourishes your skin after sun exposure. Infused with active natural ingredients like Aloe Juice, tropical butters, and chamomile extract, this lightweight formula calms, soothes, and deeply hydrates. Specially formulated for sensitive skin, Solar Soothe also incorporates Superoxide Dismutase, a powerful antioxidant that alleviates skin distress caused by sun exposure. You won’t want to miss out on the luxurious comfort and revitalization that Solar Soothe effortlessly provides!
